experience: You and Chris both know Eric Keosky-Smith, Jared Vishney, and 72 others

•	Helped customers who recently purchased Infusionsoft implement the product•	Identified narrow scope to help solve a problem clients face right now in their business•	Created done for you campaigns and other modules in the Infusionsoft application.•	Coached clients to a high level of understanding of the application.•	When necessary offered additional help to go above and beyond the required steps of a “Kickstart”•	Communicated the vison of Infusionsoft to clients to aid in decision making•	Managed my own book of business as well as books of business in my client’s applications.

Lead an amazing team of up to 15chat and phone representatives.  I helped them grow in their current roll by helping them manage time in and out of the queues, as well as time spent with individual customer.  My team was so good in fact, we had part time employees taking as many if not more chats than other teams full time staff.     I also spent time coaching them on the Infusionsoft product and preforming call and chat QA reviews, as well as performance reviews weekly.  My team was ranked 1st or 2nd every month consistently.  Metrics measured were: Average Speed of Answer, Total chats/phone calls taken, Net Promoter Score, Utilization, and Service Referrals to our sales team.

Handled inbound chats from customers with the intent of answering questions, teaching best practices, or troubleshooting issues using a variety of tools, techniques and proceduresUse technical aptitude and a love for people to address customers’ explicit needs and fill in the gaps for the unspoken needsActively participate and contribute to a growing knowledge network to improve our effectiveness as a team and improve the resources available to our customersCreate delightful customer relationships which include consistent follow-through, setting proper expectations, and advocating for client issues within internal departments

Met and exceeded minimum department quality standards Interact and communicate effectively cross-functionally and with various levels of the organization research customer issuesResearch and investigate issues using multiple systems is requiredWork in a fast-paced, changing environment.Learned and adapted to new environments, business processes, and systems quicklyIdentified and resolved customer concerns related to GoDaddy Hosting products and serviceConsult with a customer on their business needs by matching GoDaddy products and/or solutions to their online goals.

summary: Looking for my next challenge. One of my passions is helping other succeed in whatever way I can.  As a people leader I really enjoy taking time with each the employees I am responsible for, and really getting to know them as people and get a feel for their personal as well as professional goals. Then help them reach those goals.Thru my leadership (and my employees AWESOMENESS) my team is ranked 1rst or 2nd every month consecutively.  Metrics measured are: Average Speed of Answer, Total chats/phone calls taken, Net Promoter Score, Utilization, and Service Referrals to our sales team. I enjoy a challenge, and thrive in ambiguity. I'm am happily married and a father of one!  I love spending time with my family in and outdoors.  One of my favorite hobbies is working as a pyro, setting up, shooting, and breaking down professional fireworks shows.
name: Chris Waite
